Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
com.builderportfolio.service.ProjectService
public class ProjectService extends Object
Service layer class that handles all project-related operations. Acts as a bridge between the View layer and DAO layer.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public void createProject(String projectName, String description, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, Client client, Status status, String builderId, String managerId)
      Creates a new project and assigns it to both a Builder and a Project Manager.
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project
      description - Project description
      startDate - Project start date
      endDate - Project end date
      client - Client associated with the project
      status - Initial project status
      builderId - ID of the builder responsible for the project
      managerId - ID of the project manager responsible for the project

    • getManagerProjects

      public List<Project> getManagerProjects(String managerId)
      Retrieves all projects managed by a specific Project Manager.
      Parameters:
      managerId - ID of the manager
      Returns:
      list of projects assigned to the manager

    • getBuilderProjects

      public List<Project> getBuilderProjects(String builderId)
      Retrieves all projects assigned to a specific Builder.
      Parameters:
      builderId - ID of the builder
      Returns:
      list of projects assigned to the builder

    • updateProjectStatus

      public boolean updateProjectStatus(String builderId, long projectId, Status newStatus)
      Updates the status of a project by the assigned Builder.
      Parameters:
      builderId - ID of the builder attempting the update
      projectId - ID of the project
      newStatus - New project status
      Returns:
      true if update is successful, false otherwise

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(String managerId, long projectId)
      Deletes a project if requested by the correct Project Manager. Also removes project references from Builder and Manager records.
      Parameters:
      managerId - ID of the manager attempting deletion
      projectId - ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if deletion is successful, false otherwise
